title: Allah gave Hidaayah to Santiago from Argentina who accepted Islam after discussing with Zakir Naik
transcript: because the minimum two things as I told you earlier when we were discussing the minimum two things required for a person to enter the fold of Islam and number one believe that there is no God and you worship him alone and number two that you believe that uh Prophet Muhammad is the last and final foreign yes I do so I listed in Arabic the same thing repeat after me and then you said the translation perfect I should do Allah Allah I bear witness that that there is no God there is no God but Allah that
